short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage bookmarks in a pop-up window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Function description:

* Find what you need in more bookmark folders.
* Convenient for you to find what you need in all your favorite bookmarks.
* Move and reclassify all bookmarks.
* This extension does not collect and record all your data.

The reason for publishing this extension is that I have too many bookmarks. Every time I want to find the bookmarks I need, I have to scroll the mouse up and down to find them. So I want to develop such a tool to help me manage my bookmarks. Now I want to share it with more friends.
